alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:16PM CDT until May 19 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WHEELER AND NORTHEASTERN GRAY COUNTIES... At 716 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Codman, or 10 miles south of Miami, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Wheeler and northeastern Gray Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
